__e: I'll accompany the countess back to the house and be back in time for supper.
I want to know who this Comtesse is everyone keeps talking about.
And, Countess, really, if I were you:
The Countess is not staying with her mother!
Countess, I don't know anything about your husband. But when those shots were fired and I saw that look on your face...
Though it seems the comtesse isn't very happy about it.
